function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate risk communication regarding the 2019-2020 Wuhan COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the severity and spread of the virus, leading to delayed or ineffective measures","Mitigation":"Implement clear and consistent risk communication strategies, provide accurate and timely information to the public","Technologies":"Digital platforms for real-time updates, multilingual communication tools","People":"General public, health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, communication experts"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in identifying the source of the virus","Impact":"Inability to effectively contain the spread of the virus, ongoing risk of new outbreaks","Mitigation":"Invest in extensive research to identify the source, collaborate with global health organizations for comprehensive investigation","Technologies":"Advanced molecular and genetic analysis tools, epidemiological modeling software","People":"Research scientists, epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Health research institutions, global health organizations"},{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 cases from Wuhan","Impact":"Widespread transmission of the virus to multiple countries, leading to a pandemic","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and international collaboration in containment efforts","Technologies":"Travel tracking systems, contact tracing apps, real-time surveillance systems","People":"International travelers, air transportation industry, public health agencies","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations"}]}
